text: The 1995 Air Force Falcons football team represented the United States Air Force Academy in the 1995 NCAA Division I-A football season.https://www.sports-reference.com/cfb/schools/air- force/1995-schedule.html The team was led by 12th-year head coach Fisher DeBerry and played its home games in Falcon Stadium. It finished the regular season with an 8-4 record overall and a 6-2 record in the Western Athletic Conference, making the team conference co-champions. The team was selected to play in the Copper Bowl, which it lost 41-55 to Texas Tech. ==Schedule== ==Personnel== ==References== Air Force Category:Air Force Falcons football seasons Category:Western Athletic Conference football champion seasons Air Force
title: 1995 Air Force Falcons football team
